ISSUE.TITLE: System log doesn't show exception
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.20 Beta Steps to reproduce the problem: Base 4.20 beta. If an exception occurs, the FullMessage is always empty. The problem is in LogModelFactory, in the routine PrepareLogModel. This routine sets model.FullMessage to the text from the log record, then two lines later always sets model.FullMessage to null.
